Aura: Demon's Knot.name: Aura: Demon's Knot
Aura: Demon's Knot.description: You take a –1 status penalty to Will saves.

Aura: Elysian Dew.name: Aura: Elysian Dew
Aura: Elysian Dew.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8vN6vm2fKB4rE86U]{Elysian Dew}

You gain a 10-foot aura that evokes the vitality of Elysium, causing nearby objects to seem more colorful and plants to stand taller. You and any ally that starts its turn in the emanation gain 5 temporary Hit Points, a +1 item bonus to saving throws, and a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks until the start of your or the ally's next turn.

The light cast by the symbol becomes bright light. Creatures in the light receive a status penalty to Deception and Stealth checks and your enemies gain weakness to spirit damage.

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater).description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 20 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Arachnid Harness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JG7p7yI12cAPuJ8X]{Arachnid Harness} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NIyJqiW1Wci6gP9m]{Arachnid Harness (Greater)}

You gain a climb Speed equal to half your land Speed and have your limbs free as you climb. If you use all your free limbs to help you Climb, your climb Speed equals your land Speed.

Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.name: Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalty)
Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.description: The targets take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as roots rapidly sprout from their wounds, which lasts until they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (DC 20).

Effect: Architect's Pattern Book.name: Effect: Architect's Pattern Book
Effect: Architect's Pattern Book.description: If your next action is to cast a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mwPfoYfVGSMAaUec]{Cozy Cabin}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vPWMEyVTreMOoFnm]{Planar Palace}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KPDHmmjJiw7PhTYF]{Resplendent Mansion} spell, you add a room to the structure that is up to 10 feet per side per rank of the spell. This room is outfitted with all the accoutrements for a particular type of recreation, determined by you when you cast the spell. Any character who spends at least 1 hour using this recreational facility and then sleeps a full 8 hours inside the location created by the spell is exceptionally well-rested. They regain double the amount of Hit Points they would normally receive for an 8-hour rest, and when they make the next day's preparations, they gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks and Will saves for the next 12 hours.

Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.name: Effect: Aromatic Ammunition
Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.description: The components of this ammunition emit a strong smell when combined during its activation. A creature hit by an activated aromatic ammunition gains a distinct odor for up to 1 hour or until the scent is washed off (requiring at least a gallon of water and 10 minutes of scrubbing). Any creatures within 30 feet smell the target, allowing even those with a weak sense of smell to detect its presence, and all creatures gain a +1 item bonus to Track the affected creature for as long as it has the odor. A creature that has imprecise or precise scent doubles the range at which they can detect the target using their scent compared to the normal range of their scent.

Effect: Ascendant Dragon Spirit.name: Effect: Ascendant Dragon Spirit
Effect: Ascendant Dragon Spirit.description: Your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 1d6 poison damage and an additional 1d6 void damage.

Effect: Assassin Vine Wine.name: Effect: Assassin Vine Wine
Effect: Assassin Vine Wine.description:

Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Lotus).name: Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Lotus)
Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Lotus).description: A glow envelops your ally as a sense of enlightened peace ripples out from within. The ally gains a +2 status bonus to Will saves against mental effects for 1 minute. This bonus increases to +3 against emotion effects.

Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Magnolia).name: Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Magnolia)
Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Magnolia).description: Your ally seems more charming, though no one can pinpoint why. They gain a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 10 minutes. Once on their next turn, the ally can attempt to draw a creature's attention. To do so, the ally must spend 1 action (which has the emotion, mental, and visual traits) to select a creature the ally can see and make eye contact in a way the target can see. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} with your ally until the end of that ally's next turn. If the save succeeds or the effect ends, the target is temporarily immune to being fascinated by any magnolia bewitching bloom for 24 hours.

Effect: Blast Boots (Major).name: Effect: Blast Boots (Major)
Effect: Blast Boots (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.sK2zEyhxxP6UnhQk]{Blast Boots (Major)}

For 1 minute, the major blast boots remain active, allowing you to clumsily fly through the air for the duration. You gain a 30-foot Fly speed for the duration, but any time you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Blast Suit.name: Effect: Blast Suit
Effect: Blast Suit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.GPrjYsQiC3jKdQmO]{Blast Suit}

The blast suit locks together into a rigid bulwark, protecting you from the blast but preventing you from moving from your position under any circumstances. You become immobilized, gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex save against area effects, and gain resistance 5 to all damage you would normally take from area effects and scatter splash damage (this doesn't damage the blast suit). These effects persist for as long as the suit remains in the locked position. You can Interact with the suit to unlock it.

Unimplemented effects: Resistance to scatter splash damage.

Effect: Blaze.name: Effect: Blaze
Effect: Blaze.description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to saves versus fire effects.

Effect: Curse of Potent Poison.name: Effect: Curse of Potent Poison
Effect: Curse of Potent Poison.description:
This curse magically speeds poison through your body.

Effect You take a -1 status penalty to Fortitude saves and you gain weakness 3 to poison (if you already have weakness to poison, increase it by 3). The curse remains until removed by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction} or similar magic.

Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove or Trip you, and to saving throws against effects that attempt to force you to move or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. You can attempt to Shove or Trip creatures up to two sizes larger than you.

Drawback You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} condition and can't remove it while under the effects of the mutagen.

Effect: Deadweight Mutagen (Lesser).name: Effect: Deadweight Mutagen (Lesser)

Benefit You gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove or Trip you, and to saving throws against effects that attempt to force you to move or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Drawback You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} condition and can't remove it while under the effects of the mutagen.

You can attempt to Shove or Trip creatures up to three sizes larger than you.

Drawback You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} condition and can't remove it while under the effects of the mutagen.

Drawback You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} condition and can't remove it while under the effects of the mutagen.

Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critic.name: Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critical Failure)
Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critic.description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to attack rolls for 1 round or until it Escapes (DC 18).

Effect: Deadweight Snare (Success).name: Effect: Deadweight Snare (Success)
Effect: Deadweight Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls for 1 round or until it Escapes (DC 18).

Effect: Deck of Destiny.name: Effect: Deck of Destiny
Effect: Deck of Destiny.description: Choose either weal or woe. With weal (a fortune effect), the triggering creature rolls twice and takes the better result on their check. With woe (a misfortune effect), the triggering creature is forced to roll twice and take the worse result. If the card you drew is related to the check, such as drawing a card from the suit of shields for a Fortitude saving throw or a card from the suit of crowns for a Deception check, the creature is affected further. When choosing weal, the creature gains a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering check. When faced with woe, the triggering creature takes a –4 circumstance penalty to the triggering check

Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2).name: Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2)

Effect: Desolation Locket - Weapon.name: Effect: Desolation Locket - Weapon
Effect: Desolation Locket - Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.mOOJwTOxEFYfi9LV]{Desolation Locket}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WC0MDw9oLnAtLmh5]{Desolation Locket (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.3p4fk9pbwDeue1NG]{Desolation Locket (Major)}

After you cast an enchantment spell by activating the locket, you emanate an aura of hopelessness in a 5-foot emanation until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Diplomat's Charcuterie.name: Effect: Diplomat's Charcuterie
Effect: Diplomat's Charcuterie.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} and Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}.

Effect: Disarm (Success).name: Effect: Disarm (Success)

Granted by a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}

You have a weakened grasp on an item. Further attempts to Disarm the item gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and you take a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the item or other checks requiring a firm grasp on the item. You can end the effect by Interacting to change your grip on the item; otherwise, it lasts as long as you hold the item.

Effect: Draft of Stellar Radiance.name: Effect: Draft of Stellar Radiance

When you activate the scale, for 1 minute you gain a swim Speed equal to half your land Speed.

The latticework glows for 1 minute, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet). You can Dismiss this light.

Activate 2 envision (force)

Requirements The energizing lattice is glowing because it negated an enemy's critical hit

Effect You release the lattice's energy and make a weapon or unarmed attack Strike that deals 6d6 additional force damage. If your Strike fails, but doesn't critically fail, the target still takes half the force damage. The latticework ceases glowing after the Strike.

  • Mournful: resistance 1 to void or vitality depending on negative healing
  • Skeptical: +1 item bonus to saves against magic
  • Titanic: size change to Large, Clumsy 1, and change of reach (+5 for Medium and Small, +10 for Tiny)
  • Wyrmhide: resistance 1 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison.

Effect: Fury Cocktail (Moderate).name: Effect: Fury Cocktail (Moderate)
Effect: Fury Cocktail (Moderate).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JmxKmYQPQmUlauO4]{Fury Cocktail (Moderate)}

Implemented Effects:

  • +3 item bonus to melee attack rolls
  • -1 penalty to AC
  • -2 penalty to Reflex saves
  • Animalistic: choice of Jaw or Claw strike
  • Double: resistance 2 to physical damage
  • Mournful: resistance 5 to void or vitality depending on negative healing
  • Skeptical: +2 item bonus to saves against magic
  • Titanic: size change to Large, Clumsy 1, and change of reach (+5 for Medium and Small, +10 for Tiny)
  • Wyrmhide: resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison.

Effect: Galvanic Chew.name: Effect: Galvanic Chew
Effect: Galvanic Chew.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zg4aR2ndtTzO1osa]{Galvanic Chew}

For up to 1 hour, you have resistance 5 to electricity.

Effect: Gecko Potion.name: Effect: Gecko Potion
Effect: Gecko Potion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hGw7Q1y2IEXRGAfv]{Gecko Potion}

Implemented effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}
  • +1 item bonus to Thievery checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ijZ0DDFpMkWqaShd]{Palm an Object}
  • +1 item bonus to Reflex DC against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} attempts

Effect: Ghost Lantern.name: Effect: Ghost Lantern
Effect: Ghost Lantern.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pZhqdggB36MpDUwh]{Ghost Lantern}

The creature gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune on all its weapons and unarmed attacks.

Effect: Ghost Oil.name: Effect: Ghost Oil
Effect: Ghost Oil.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MIP28AmODXgyF2D2]{Ghost Oil}

The selected weapon gains the effects of a ghost touch rune.

Effect: Ghostbane Fulu.name: Effect: Ghostbane Fulu
Effect: Ghostbane Fulu.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Uzf9hqwec8fY2j4G]{Ghostbane Fulu}

Upon activation, the weapon gains the benefit of the ghost touch property rune against the triggering incorporeal creature for 1 minute.

Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor.name: Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor
Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.v7YHA9UhDgsvQ47Q]{Ghostcaller's Planchette}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the planchette, you gain resistance 5 to all physical damage (except ghost touch) until the start of your next turn. Attacks by incorporeal creatures (such as a ghost’s ghostly hand) count as ghost touch.

Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor.name: Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor (Greater)
Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.utRZnCD2XI9Q1dWE]{Ghostcaller's Planchette (Greater)}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the planchette, you gain resistance 10 to all physical damage (except ghost touch) until the start of your next turn. Attacks by incorporeal creatures (such as a ghost’s ghostly hand) count as ghost touch.

Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapo.name: Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapon
Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.v7YHA9UhDgsvQ47Q]{Ghostcaller's Planchette}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the planchette, the affixed weapon gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapo.name: Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapon (Greater)
Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.utRZnCD2XI9Q1dWE]{Ghostcaller's Planchette (Greater)}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the planchette, the affixed weapon gains the effects of both the ghost touch and greater disrupting property runes until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Ginger Chew.name: Effect: Ginger Chew
Effect: Ginger Chew.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.uPP678KODkgDy8UO]{Ginger Chew}

A ginger chew lasts for 1 hour and grants you a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saves against being sickened.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failu.name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failure)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failu.description: The creature takes a -4 status penalty to Stealth checks for 5 minutes or until it spends a 3-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Stealth checks for 2 minutes or until it spends a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. If the creature was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to visual senses.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Success)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Stealth checks for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to remove the glitter.

Effect: Glow Rod.name: Effect: Glow Rod
Effect: Glow Rod.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.y4WJY8rCbY6d1MET]{Glow Rod}

The rod sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet).

Effect: Glowing Lantern Fruit (Lantern L.name: Effect: Glowing Lantern Fruit (Lantern Light)
Effect: Glowing Lantern Fruit (Lantern L.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.INyiWvehFuo8nGaa]{Glowing Lantern Fruit}

The glowing lantern fruit sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet). You can Interact with the glowing lantern fruit to open or close some of its reflective leaves, making the light directional like a bull's-eye lantern or a hooded lantern.

Effect: Glue Bomb (Greater).name: Effect: Glue Bomb (Greater)
Effect: Glue Bomb (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5Qkz4RVJr2Kx3RL6]{Glue Bomb (Greater)}

The target takes a –15-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Glue Bomb (Lesser).name: Effect: Glue Bomb (Lesser)
Effect: Glue Bomb (Lesser).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Glue Bomb (Lesser)}

The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Glue Bomb (Major).name: Effect: Glue Bomb (Major)
Effect: Glue Bomb (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.BxJNWWvpxacDIsdt]{Glue Bomb (Major)}

The target takes a –20-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Glue Bomb (Moderate).name: Effect: Glue Bomb (Moderate)
Effect: Glue Bomb (Moderate).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.evBPzM1VsuYcoenn]{Glue Bomb (Moderate)}

The target takes a –15-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Goo Grenade.name: Effect: Goo Grenade
Effect: Goo Grenade.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.t2A5PzInAqmErLzK]{Goo Grenade (Lesser)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wi97vRj8IXx3wLmZ]{Goo Grenade (Moderate)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SAtG9jrqey2y8EGb]{Goo Grenade (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.W0RWd2E0jkF2ZXhf]{Goo Grenade (Major)}

When you hit a creature with a goo grenade, that creature takes persistent acid damage and a circumstance penalty to its Speeds from the clinging goo.

The target can end any penalties, conditions, and persistent damage caused by the bomb by Escaping or spending a total of 3 Interact actions to pry themselves free of the ooze. These Interact actions don't have to be consecutive, and other creatures can provide the actions as well.

Effect: Grasp of Droskar.name: Effect: Grasp of Droskar
Effect: Grasp of Droskar.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wWXnr3xw5TzDL1M7]{Grasp of Droskar}

You gain a +1 item bonus on all Athletics checks.

Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.name: Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight
Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on your Perception check to Seek or skill check to Recall Knowledge.

Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.name: Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form
Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision and a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.name: Effect: Greater Healer's Gel
Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 15 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.name: Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form
Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.description: For the next hour, you gain a +3 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +4 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor.name: Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor
Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.OjOpj9u1EdEUhKuX]{Grim Sandglass}

You gain resistance 2 to void.

Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor (Greater).name: Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor (Greater)
Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.yQTmIcXIDg7nVpJX]{Grim Sandglass (Greater)}

You gain resistance 5 to void.

Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor (Major).name: Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor (Major)
Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.beHqICAYt9ZuyBay]{Grim Sandglass (Major)}

You gain resistance 10 to void.

Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon.name: Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon
Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.OjOpj9u1EdEUhKuX]{Grim Sandglass}

After you cast a necromancy spell by Activating the sandglass, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 void damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon (Greater.name: Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon (Greater)
Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon (Greater.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.yQTmIcXIDg7nVpJX]{Grim Sandglass (Greater)}

After you cast a necromancy spell by Activating the sandglass, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d6 void damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon (Major).name: Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon (Major)
Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.beHqICAYt9ZuyBay]{Grim Sandglass (Major)}

After you cast a necromancy spell by Activating the sandglass, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d8 void damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Grindlegrub Steak.name: Effect: Grindlegrub Steak
Effect: Grindlegrub Steak.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ALfqpWLbLPSXxZVG]{Grindlegrub Steak}

You do not need to eat for three days after consuming a grindlegrub steak, and for that duration you gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against fatigue and the drained condition.

Effect: Grit (Stage 1).name: Effect: Grit (Stage 1)
Effect: Grit (Stage 1).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vl5dww56cbXo9QnP]{Grit}

The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Athletics, Crafting, and Performance checks.

Effect: Grit (Stage 2).name: Effect: Grit (Stage 2)
Effect: Grit (Stage 2).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vl5dww56cbXo9QnP]{Grit}

The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Athletics, Crafting, and Performance checks, and a -2 item penalty to Perception checks.

Effect: Grit (Stage 3).name: Effect: Grit (Stage 3)
Effect: Grit (Stage 3).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vl5dww56cbXo9QnP]{Grit}

The creature takes a -4 item penalty to Perception checks.

Effect: Grudgestone.name: Effect: Grudgestone
Effect: Grudgestone.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SH0WmAdjIaNN3OiN]{Grudgestone}

Your Strikes with the affixed weapon against the triggering creature gain a +3 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Grudgestone (Greater).name: Effect: Grudgestone (Greater)
Effect: Grudgestone (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rEev4xrQyMvjz7W7]{Grudgestone (Greater)}

Your Strikes with the affixed weapon against the triggering creature gain a +5 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Guardian Staff.name: Effect: Guardian Staff
Effect: Guardian Staff.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.UQ0h9IVtHla8gWT7]{Guardian Staff}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.jIX2T21YvEsRaaqp]{Guardian Staff (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.REvrniIEqBykkWyI]{Guardian Staff (Major)}

A ruby-colored plane of force appears like a shield near the ally, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Heartripper Blade.name: Effect: Heartripper Blade
Effect: Heartripper Blade.description: Strikes with the heartripper blade inflict an additional @Damage[1d6[void]] damage to living creatures.

Effect: Hexing Jar.name: Effect: Hexing Jar
Effect: Hexing Jar.description: The thing in the hexing jar becomes more energetic—glowing, dancing, rapping on the glass, or some other action appropriate to its appearance. It encourages you until the start of your next turn, granting you and your familiar a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws and a +2 status bonus against mental effects.

Effect: Holy Steam Ball.name: Effect: Holy Steam Ball
Effect: Holy Steam Ball.description: Each use of the holy steam ball lasts for 1 hour and gives you a +2 item bonus to Will saving throws against possession effects from fiends and undead and effects from fiends and undead that cause the controlled condition.

0.label: Saving vs. Possession or Control Effect from Undead or Fiend

Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Lantern).name: Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Lantern)
Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Lantern).description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks and cast bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Umbrella).name: Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Umbrella)
Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Umbrella).description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Survival checks.

Effect: Horn of Exorcism (Sacred Seeds).name: Effect: Horn of Exorcism (Sacred Seeds)
Effect: Horn of Exorcism (Sacred Seeds).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.xdPU7qrl5hIvaArY]{Horn of Exorcism}

The horn grants you the ghost touch property rune on all of your weapon and unarmed Strikes.

Effect: Hunter's Brooch.name: Effect: Hunter's Brooch
Effect: Hunter's Brooch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.4ObrlZ5GhCPA2E2s]{Hunter's Brooch}

By touching a weapon you wield to the symbol and uttering a plea for Erastil's steadying hand, you grant that weapon the deadly d12 trait. Against undead, the weapon instead gains the fatal d12 trait. This blessing lasts for 1 minute, until you score a critical hit with the weapon, or until you aren't wielding the weapon.

Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.name: Effect: Hyldarf's Fang
Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.O7pgJB6M5UqUZ9Qq]{Hyldarf's Fang}

You call upon Hyldarf's power to gain the magic of a linnorm for a brief time. For 1 minute, you gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Unfettered Movement}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{Truesight} as well as fire resistance 20.

Effect: Ichthyosis Mutagen.name: Effect: Ichthyosis Mutagen
Effect: Ichthyosis Mutagen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.uwVTuejjSLl82jiA]{Ichthyosis Mutagen}

Benefit For 1 minute, you gain fast healing 2 and automatically succeed at flat checks to recover from persistent bleed damage.

Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves for 1 minute.

Effect: Illuminated Folio.name: Effect: Illuminated Folio
Effect: Illuminated Folio.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8anSflDImoYUv2UK]{Illuminated Folio}

These summoned creatures appear as living illustrations, granting them resistance to physical damage equal to half their level and weakness 5 to fire and to any ability with the water trait.

Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol.name: Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol
Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol.description: For 1 minute, you look like a flaming corpse. During this time, you gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks and the immolation hand cannon becomes a +2 striking flaming hand cannon.

Effect: Impenetrable Scale.name: Effect: Impenetrable Scale
Effect: Impenetrable Scale.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.aLA7pikfeNIAAGLw]{Impenetrable Scale}

Whenever the armor's fortification rune successfully turns a significant foe's critical hit into a normal hit, one of the scales on the armor turns violet. You gain resistance to physical damage equal to the number of violet scales, to a maximum of 8.

At dawn each day, all the violet scales return to normal.

Effect: Impossible Cake.name: Effect: Impossible Cake
Effect: Impossible Cake.description: For 10 minutes after the meal, you gain a +2 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater).name: Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater)
Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater).description: For 30 minutes after the meal, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Impossible Cake (Major).name: Effect: Impossible Cake (Major)
Effect: Impossible Cake (Major).description: For 1 hour after the meal, you gain a +4 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Improvised Weapon.name: Effect: Improvised Weapon
Effect: Improvised Weapon.description:
Automatically applied effects:

  • -2 penalty to attack rolls with any weapon with an improvised trait.

Effect: Injigo's Loving Embrace.name: Effect: Injigo's Loving Embrace
Effect: Injigo's Loving Embrace.description: You gain resistance 5 to mental damage and a +1 item bonus to saving throws against mental effects

Effect: Iron Medallion.name: Effect: Iron Medallion
Effect: Iron Medallion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ewzJzyJ4Vo9lZKvp]{Iron Medallion}

You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering save and other saves against fear.

Effect: Irondust Stew.name: Effect: Irondust Stew
Effect: Irondust Stew.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hSJWv6aOwlJyKSLs]{Irondust Stew}

You gain 3 resistance to physical damage for 1 minute, but take a –2 item penalty to Acrobatics and Athletics checks during that time.

Effect: Ivory Baton.name: Effect: Ivory Baton
Effect: Ivory Baton.description: The construct gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws (except saving throws against the ivory baton).

Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape.name: Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape
Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

Effect: Jann's Prism (Jann's Light).name: Effect: Jann's Prism (Jann's Light)
Effect: Jann's Prism (Jann's Light).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.jsTc3wyD0gSdXILQ]{Jann's Prism}

You shed bright light in a 20-foot emanation (and dim light for the next 20 feet). You gain resistance 5 to two damage types.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor.name: Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor
Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.0gxqSZhYdOeJhPrp]{Jolt Coil}

You gain resistance 2 to electricity.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Greater).name: Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Greater)
Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.auEm7vmpG9V8xpAJ]{Jolt Coil (Greater)}

You gain resistance 3 to electricity.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Major).name: Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Major)
Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TucjFO5NQHvUUc7a]{Jolt Coil (Major)}

You gain resistance 5 to electricity.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon.name: Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon
Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.0gxqSZhYdOeJhPrp]{Jolt Coil}

After you cast an electricity spell by activating the coil, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 electricity damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Greater).name: Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Greater)
Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.auEm7vmpG9V8xpAJ]{Jolt Coil (Greater)}

After you cast an electricity spell by activating the coil, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d6 electricity damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Major).name: Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Major)
Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Major).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TucjFO5NQHvUUc7a]{Jolt Coil (Major)}

After you cast an electricity spell by activating the coil, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d8 electricity damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Journeybread (Power).name: Effect: Journeybread (Power)
Effect: Journeybread (Power).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.7Sm8NhvQcwi84Nsh]{Journeybread (Power)}

In addition to the benefits of journeybread, power journeybread grants you a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb, Force Open, and Swim, and to Fortitude saving throws against being sickened.

Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater).name: Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)
Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TMtQnY6yvIRCpK9v]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)}

Implemented effects:

  • +3 item bonus to Fortitude saves
  • Gain 30 temporary Hit Points
  • -2 penalty to Will saves
  • -2 penalty to Perception checks
  • -2 penalty to initiative rolls
  • Treat Fortitude success as critical success

Unimplemented effects:

Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form.name: Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form
Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision, imprecise scent to a range of 30 feet, and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb)
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A superb camouflage suit is fashioned from especially well-blended materials grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Shining Ammunition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NI7twU2G6UCDmvCO]{Shining Ammunition}

The ammunition sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet) for 10 minutes. If it hits a target, it sticks, causing the target to shed light in the same radius. A creature can remove the ammunition with an Interact action, but the ammunition itself continues to glow for the rest of the duration or until destroyed.

Effect: Shining Symbol.name: Effect: Shining Symbol
Effect: Shining Symbol.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.YVtXlsEWb3NIkDyy]{Shining Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.M7c4uXraP05HYNXs]{Shining Symbol (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.etnis6HOeGZEbScD]{Shining Symbol (Major)}

Effect: Shrine Inarizushi.name: Effect: Shrine Inarizushi
Effect: Shrine Inarizushi.description: Whenever you are in exploration mode, roll a separate Search activity check with a +1 status bonus; this does not affect your Speed. If the check succeeds, a fox appears to inform you of this discovery as best as it can, although it cannot speak.

Effect: Shrinking Potion.name: Effect: Shrinking Potion
Effect: Shrinking Potion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FqbDpztscJfM4XMe]{Shrinking Potion}

Effect: Shrinking Potion (Greater).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5xsfj30uXMKINxnk]{Shrinking Potion (Greater)}

This fungus-flavored potion conveys the effects of a 4th-rank shrink spell to make you and all your gear smaller. In addition, you gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while shrunken.

Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated S.name: Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated Strike)
Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated S.description: The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Climb).description: You animate the silkspinner's shield. Eight spider legs sprout from the shield's rim, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet until the end of your next turn.

Duration 1 hour

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +3 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

Duration 1 minute

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

Duration 10 minute

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +2 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Skinstitch Salve.name: Effect: Skinstitch Salve
Effect: Skinstitch Salve.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FgAPV0iLE6R1QMJ5]{Skinstitch Salve}

You gain a +2 item bonus to medicine checks and if you roll a success on Treat Wounds or Battle Medicine you get a critical success instead

Effect: Skyfang Crystal.name: Effect: Skyfang Crystal
Effect: Skyfang Crystal.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that the marked creature generates.

Effect: Skyrider Sword.name: Effect: Skyrider Sword
Effect: Skyrider Sword.description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air for up to 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater).name: Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater)
Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater).description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

Effect: Slime Whip.name: Effect: Slime Whip
Effect: Slime Whip.description: For 1 round, the slime whip deals acid damage rather than slashing damage. If the attack deals persistent damage, the persistent damage is also acid damage instead of its usual type.

Effect: Sneaky Key.name: Effect: Sneaky Key
Effect: Sneaky Key.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1v1OK06JxdXn6MP4]{Sneaky Key}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock.

Effect: Soothing Toddy.name: Effect: Soothing Toddy
Effect: Soothing Toddy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Jgv2PAJic7LPoGQx]{Soothing Toddy}

A soothing toddy grants you a +1 item bonus to saving throws against emotion effects and against effects with a trait determined by the liquor mixed into the tea when it's created.

  • Amaretto Auditory
  • Limoncello Olfactory
  • Whiskey Visual

Effect: Soulspark Candle.name: Effect: Soulspark Candle
Effect: Soulspark Candle.description: Worshippers of Pharasma gain a +3 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, saving throws, and Perception checks. Undead creatures and worshippers of Urgathoa within this area take a –3 status penalty to those checks..

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.name: Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.description:
While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: The damage cannot currently be made to automatically increase as the damage dice increase.

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.name: Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed Boost)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.description:
You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.

While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: the base +2 increase to damage is included in this effect. It cannot currently be made to automatically increase.

Effect: Sparkler.name: Effect: Sparkler
Effect: Sparkler.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hd8D1Dm6aVhMYpEL]{Sparkler}

A sparkler provides bright light in a 10-foot radius (and dim light for the next 10 feet). While the sparkler burns, you can use it as an improvised weapon, dealing 1 fire damage on a hit. On a critical hit, you cause the target to become dazzled for 1 round.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet and a +3 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 hour.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 15 feet and a +1 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 minute.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Moderate).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Moderate)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Moderate).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 20 feet and a +2 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 10 minutes.

Effect: Spined Shield Spines.name: Effect: Spined Shield Spines
Effect: Spined Shield Spines.description: When you use the Shield Block reaction with this shield, the spines take the damage before the shield itself does. When the shield would take damage (after applying Hardness), one spine snaps off per 6 damage, reducing the damage by 6.

Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Armor.name: Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Armor
Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.AYg155apTZtebV4Z]{Spiny Lodestone}

As normal, this applies to creatures who choose to touch you, not when you touch or attack another creature.

Note: This item originates from the 2022 Paizo April Fools Blog post.

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to Perception checks and Will saves. After any round where you don't spend at least 1 action to Interact with an object, Perform, Step, or Stride, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.description: For the duration of the spell, you can use the limning flames as a source for your magic. Creatures affected by your faerie fire must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or take a -2 status penalty to their Will saves against enchantment and illusions spells as long as they are affected by faerie fire. You can cast an enchantment or illusion spell on such a creature up to a distance twice the spell's normal range. If the spell has a range of touch, or doesn't have a range, it is unaffected by the increase in range from the faerie fire.
